article_title: Bowen: West left powerless as Israel claims its biggest victory yet against Hezbollah
sentence: Biden  believed  that  he  could  persuade  Netanyahu  not  just  to  change  the  way  Israel  fights  –  the  president  has  said  repeatedly  that  it  is  imposing  too  much  suffering  and  killing  too  many  Palestinian  civilians  –  but  to  accept  an  American  plan  for  the  day  after  that  rested  on  creating  an  independent  Palestinian  state  alongside  Israel.
